formattedAddress: 1 E 69th St, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1 E 69th St, New York, NY 10021-4957, USA

originalText.text: I've been a long time client of this office and have come to be so disappointed in their practice. I've been going back there almost every month for a stubborn wart on my finger - freezing it, removing it etc and have nearly spent $2K + on doctors visits there over the past few months. I went there today simply for the doctor to look at my finger to make sure it wasn't infected and for two minutes of her time she charged me $250 dollars. Absolutely ridiculous! I told the manager that I simply wanted to make sure that my finger was okay and on the right track and she replied "this is office policy."I'm not typically a complainer and have so much respect for the medical world - but this is beyond me. Money hungry, money driven, taking advantage of the upper class given their fifth avenue location. So disappointed and disheartened in this place- especially after going here since i was a teenager. :(

originalText.text: Dr Madfes is a magician and an angel. First of all she is so calming, you almost want to lie down for a nap. She is amazing, all around. I feel I look the best I possibly could for my age.  I know I can trust her to make the best call as to what I need, and that I won’t end up looking fake. Love Dr Madfes and her staff, who are all so sweet and helpful.

originalText.text: I’ve been a patient of Dr. Madfes for over 20 years and I’ve probably referred more than 30 people to her (including my husband, and my daughter sees her partner). Everyone has always been extremely happy, as I am. I trust her 100%. She is an excellent doctor and very vigilant with her skin cancer checks. From a cosmetic point of view she is super honest about what won’t work and what will and she’s conservative— you never see anyone “overdone” walking out of her office. If you want beautiful healthy skin she is the right doctor to go to. I love her staff too.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of both Dr. Madfes and Dr. Williams for years, they are both wonderful and caring physicians and deliver excellent care that is tailored to my needs and aesthetic ideals. They have excellent nurses/assistants, both Angel and Carolyn are lovely and thorough in their instructions. I pay out of pocket and find their fees very affordable, for years I saw in-network dermatologists that were rushed and didn't take my mild/moderate issues seriously. Although those doctors were surely well meaning, I feel I wasted my time and money allowing an insurance company to choose my provider. Thank you for taking my skincare concerns seriously and giving me back the confidence that years of problem skin eroded! Dr Madfes and Dr Williams and their team are the best NYC have to offer. Thank you!

Thank you!

originalText.text: I visited this practice today to do a Miradry procedure. Let me just say the customer experience was superb by far such a comforting process. Dr. Jakus and Donna really toke the time out to make my experience relaxing with the least amount of pain. I toke it on myself to write this review because it was well deserved. The environment was very professional, clean, and the staff was very welcoming as well. Would recommend to friends and family.
